title: Valid Login with Correct Credentials
description: Verify that a user can successfully login using valid username/email and password with proper JWT token generation and role assignment.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Input valid username/email and password
Submit login form
System returns a valid JWT token
User is redirected to the appropriate dashboard based on role

title: Invalid Login with Incorrect Credentials
description: Verify that login fails when incorrect username/email or password is used and appropriate error messages are shown.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Input invalid username/email and/or password
Submit login form
Login is rejected with correct HTTP error and error message displayed
No JWT token is issued

title: Role-Based Access Control Enforcement
description: Validate that users are only able to access resources and functionalities permitted by their assigned roles (admin, tesorero, usuario).

steps.description: Login as user with 'usuario' role
Attempt to access admin-only pages and API endpoints
Access is denied and proper error or redirect occurs
Login as admin role
Access all administration features
All admin-level features are accessible without errors

title: Dashboard Real-Time Data Representation
description: Verify that the main dashboard displays real-time statistics, active votes, recent transactions, and proposals accurately and updates dynamically.

steps.description: Login and navigate to dashboard
Dashboard shows correct live statistics for offerings, expenses, and active votes
Trigger new vote creation or new transaction
Dashboard updates display dynamically without manual refresh

title: Committee CRUD Operations
description: Test full create, read, update, and delete operations for committee management including member assignments across dynamic routes.

steps.description: Navigate to committees management page
Create a new committee with valid data
New committee is created and visible in the list
View committee details on its page
Committee details are correctly displayed
Edit committee information
Changes are saved and reflected accurately
Delete a committee
Committee is removed from the list and database

title: Committee Member Management
description: Verify that members can be added, edited, viewed, and removed from committees properly with UI and backend synchronization.

steps.description: Access a specific committee member management page
Add a new member with valid details
Member is added to the committee and displayed in the member list
Edit a member's information
Member updates are saved and correctly displayed
Remove a member from committee
Member is no longer listed in committee members

title: Voting Creation and Lifecycle Management
description: Validate creation of new votes, tracking active votes, expiration handling, and approval workflow for committee decisions.

steps.description: Navigate to voting section of a committee
Create a new vote with valid parameters
New vote appears in the active votes list with correct details
Simulate voting by committee members
Vote status updates reflect correctly in UI
Simulate vote expiration or approval
Vote lifecycle ends correctly with status update and no further voting allowed

title: Vote Expiration Edge Case Handling
description: Verify system behavior when a vote reaches expiration time, ensuring no votes are accepted and status changes correctly.

steps.description: Create a vote with an expiration timestamp in the near future
Wait until the expiration time passes
Attempt to cast a vote after expiration
System rejects vote submission due to expiration
Vote status is updated to expired

title: Offerings CRUD with Categorization and Validation
description: Verify offerings can be created, viewed, edited, and deleted with correct category assignments and frontend Zod validation on all forms.

steps.description: Navigate to offerings management page of a committee
Create a new offering with valid amount and category
Offering is listed with correct details
Attempt to create offering with invalid data (e.g. negative amount, missing category)
Form validation prevents submission with appropriate error messages
Edit an existing offering's category and amount
Offering updates are saved and displayed correctly
Delete an offering entry
Offering is removed from the list and database

title: Expenses Registration and Budget Oversight
description: Validate expense creation, editing, viewing, and deletion with categories and budget tracking functionality including validation checks.

steps.description: Navigate to expenses management page within a committee
Create a new expense record with valid category, amount, and description
Expense is listed and properly categorized
Try submitting expense with invalid data (e.g., exceeding budget, missing category)
Frontend validation using Zod prevents submission and shows errors
Edit an existing expense record
Updates are saved and reflected correctly
Delete an expense
Expense is removed from UI and backend

title: Admin User Management: Role and Permission Updates
description: Test admin functionalities for managing users including assigning roles, updating permissions, and toggling user account status.

steps.description: Login as admin and navigate to user administration panel
Select a user and modify their assigned role
Update user's permissions accordingly
Changes are saved and reflected in backend and UI
Disable a user account
User is prevented from logging in or accessing sensitive pages
Re-enable a previously disabled user
User can log in again and role permissions apply

title: PDF Report Generation and Download for Offerings
description: Verify that PDF financial reports for offerings can be generated on demand with accurate data and downloaded without corruption or errors.

steps.description: Navigate to offerings reporting page
Request generation of offerings PDF report for a specific committee/time range
Report is generated correctly with all relevant offerings data
Download the generated PDF
PDF file downloads successfully and opens without errors displaying expected content

title: API Endpoint Response Status and Schema Validation
description: Confirm that all backend RESTful API endpoints respond with correct HTTP status codes and data matching the expected schema.

steps.description: Send authenticated API requests for CRUD operations for committees, offerings, votes, and users
Each endpoint responds with expected HTTP status code (200, 201, 400, 401, 403, 404, as applicable)
Response payloads conform to the defined JSON schemas without missing or extra fields

title: Form Input Validation with Zod and React Hook Form
description: Validate that all forms related to committees, votes, offerings, and expenses enforce frontend input validation using Zod schemas integrated with React Hook Form.

steps.description: Access each data entry form (committee creation, vote creation, offering input, expense entry)
Submit the form with missing required fields, invalid data types, or out-of-range values
Form submission is blocked and descriptive validation error messages are shown inline

title: Edge Case: Large Volume Data in Dashboard Components
description: Test dashboard and list components behavior when handling large volumes of active votes, recent transactions, and propositions ensuring performance and usability.

steps.description: Seed the database with large number of votes, transactions, and propositions
Load the dashboard page
Dashboard loads within acceptable time and renders lists with proper pagination or scrolling
No UI overlap or rendering errors occur

title: Database Row Level Security (RLS) Enforcement
description: Verify that Supabase RLS policies restrict data access appropriately based on user roles and ownership for all sensitive tables.

steps.description: Login as different user roles and attempt to CRUD records in committees, offerings, votes, expenses, and users
Operations not permitted by RLS policies are rejected with appropriate errors
Users can only access and modify records they have permissions for

title: Application Build and Production Runtime Check
description: Ensure that the application builds successfully with no TypeScript errors and runs smoothly in production mode without runtime crashes.

steps.description: Run the full production build process
Build completes without errors or warnings
Deploy the built application to a production environment or simulate production run
Application loads and functions correctly without runtime errors or crashes
